node.title: Federal Health Minister confirms domestic travellers don't have to pay for COVID-19 tests
node.description: The Federal Health Minister Greg Hunt has confirmed domestic travellers do notÂ have to pay for COVID-19 tests, which state and territories require for entry, if they're obtained at a state-run clinic.
node.content:
["The Federal Health Minister Greg Hunt has confirmed domestic travellers do not\u00a0have to pay for COVID-19 tests, which state and territories require for entry, if they're obtained at a state-run clinic.", "There has\u00a0been confusion over whether it would be a user-pays requirement for entry into Queensland, at a cost of up to $150 per person.", "States such as\u00a0South Australia, Queensland, Tasmania and Western Australia require negative PCR COVID-19 tests 72 hours before entry under their re-opening border rules.", "Mr Hunt has confirmed in a statement the Commonwealth and States jointly fund tests for people that require one under a public health order, such as\u00a0a domestic travel requirement.", "Queensland Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk\u00a0has welcomed the commitment.", "\"I said we work best when we work together,\" Ms Palaszczuk said.\u00a0\"This proves it.\"", "", "
Queensland Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk has claimed it as a victory.(AAP: Dan Peled)
", "
Argument over who foots the bill
", "Queensland is set to open to fully vaccinated people who return a negative COVID test 72 hours before travel on December 17, or earlier once the state reaches 80 per cent\u00a0fully vaccinated.", "For days, Queensland ministers have been trying to pressure the federal government to pay for the tests so that travellers would\u00a0not\u00a0have to foot the bill.", "Earlier on Tuesday, the Queensland Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk said she did not\u00a0want to argue with the Commonwealth.", "\"Now is not the time to fight.\u00a0Now is the time to work together,\" Ms Palaszczuk said.", "\"Greg Hunt can quite easily make it a Medicare rebate. He can do that with the stroke of a pen.\"", "Mr Hunt had written to the Queensland Health Minister to \"raise concerns\" over why the state is testing travellers and questioning why it wasn't considering rapid antigen testing.", "He referenced an Australian Health Protection Principal Committee statement saying \"large-scale, non-targeted, asymptomatic testing in Australia should be strongly discouraged\".", "", "
Federal Health Minister Greg Hunt has written to his Queensland counterpart Yvette D'Ath about COVID testing.(ABC News)
", "
Turns out, it's free for travellers
", "The days of back-and-forth over whether a family of four would pay $600 for testing to enter seems to be a moot point.", "Mr Hunt's office confirmed travellers do not\u00a0have to pay if they\u00a0require a test as a result of a state or territory public health order and only a text message is required for the result.", "\"This includes travel domestically as a result of a state's border restriction, close contacts without symptoms \u2014 i.e., where a positive case may have attended a shopping centre \u2014\u00a0[and] workplace testing requirements in high-risk settings,\" Mr Hunt said in a statement.", "Border crossing and travel rules imposed by states are under public health orders.", "\"Testing has been proceeding without incident for the last 18 months,\" Mr Hunt said.", "\"This includes testing required to support entry into another state or territory.\"", "
Why the confusion?
", "The federal government says the 50\u201350 funding arrangement for testing has\u00a0not\u00a0changed.", "\"Throughout the pandemic, people have been able to access free COVID tests under Commonwealth and state programs,\"\u00a0Mr Hunt said.", "\"A pathology test will only be charged for a patient when they are required to obtain an official certificate, rather than using the existing text message system that is in operation in every state and territory.\"", "Ms Palaszczuk said the confusion over the PCR cost did not\u00a0originate from Queensland.", "\"Queensland made it plain weeks ago that the text message most people receive after a test is acceptable,\" she said.", "\"I am pleased this victory has occurred and people can look forward to being re-united in time for Christmas \u2014\u00a0without additional cost \u2014\u00a0as my government had always planned.\""]
